posts.title: apache配置
posts.slug: apache配置多域名绑定多端口
posts.text: apache配置多域名绑定多端口在apache默认conf/extra/下的httpd-vhost.conf文件 12345678910111213141516171819Include .../apache/conf/vhost/*.conf<VirtualHost *:80> ServerName www.example1.com ServerAlias www.example1.com ProxyPreserveHost On ProxyRequests Off ProxyPass / http://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:xxxx/ IP加端口号 ProxyPassReverse / http://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:xxxx/</VirtualHost><VirtualHost *:80> ServerName www.example2.com ServerAlias www.example2.com ProxyPreserveHost On ProxyRequests Off ProxyPass / http://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:xxxx/ ProxyPassReverse / http://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:xxxx/</VirtualHost> 在…/apache/conf/vhost/下 应有www.example1.com.confwww.example2.com.conf两个配置文件内容如下 1234567891011121314<VirtualHost *:xxxx> #对应端口号 ServerName www.example1.com ServerAlias www.example1.com DocumentRoot /data/www/example1 #对应网站位置 <Directory /data/www/example1> SetOutputFilter DEFLATE Options FollowSymLinks AllowOverride All Order Deny,Allow Require all granted DirectoryIndex index.php index.html index.htm </Directory> </VirtualHost>

posts.title: markdowntest
posts.text: markdown流程图测试 st=>start: 开始 rain?=>condition: 今天有雨吗？ takeAnUmbrella=>operation: 带伞 go=>operation: 出门 e=>end: 结束 st->rain? rain?(yes)->takeAnUmbrella->go rain?(no)->go->e{"scale":1,"line-width":2,"line-length":50,"text-margin":10,"font-size":12} var code = document.getElementById("flowchart-0-code").value; var options = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(document.getElementById("flowchart-0-options").value)); var diagram = flowchart.parse(code); diagram.drawSVG("flowchart-0", options);

posts.title: Python-01class
posts.text: Python zipfile关于zipfile模块实验12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728import os,zipfile,timesource = 'D:\\test'target_dir = 'D:\\ssh'if not os.path.exists(target_dir): os.mkdir(target_dir) today = target_dir + os.sep + time.strftime('%Y%m%d')now = time.strftime('%H%M%S')comment = input('Enter a comment --> ')if len(comment) == 0: target = today + os.sep + now + '.zip'else: target = today + os.sep + now + '_' + comment.replace(' ', '_') + '.zip'if not os.path.exists(today): os.mkdir(today) print('Successfully created directory', today)z = zipfile.ZipFile(target,'w',zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) for dirpath, dirnames, filenames in os.walk(source): fpath = dirpath.replace(source,'') fpath = fpath and fpath + os.sep or '' for filename in filenames: z.write(os.path.join(dirpath, filename),fpath+filename) print ('Successfully')z.close() 网上找了很多都不对，这个比较靠谱知乎上的 1234567z = zipfile.ZipFile(target,'w',zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) for dirpath, dirnames, filenames in os.walk(source):fpath = dirpath.replace(source,'') fpath = fpath and fpath + os.sep or ''for filename in filenames: z.write(os.path.join(dirpath, filename),fpath+filename) print ('success') 相关参数 target，source

posts.title: Python
posts.text: Welcome to Python! Get StartFirst1>>> import this Then123456789101112131415161718192021The Zen of Python, by Tim PetersBeautiful is better than ugly.Explicit is better than implicit.Simple is better than complex.Complex is better than complicated.Flat is better than nested.Sparse is better than dense.Readability counts.Special cases aren't special enough to break the rules.Although practicality beats purity.Errors should never pass silently.Unless explicitly silenced.In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.Although that way may not be obvious at first unless you're Dutch.Now is better than never.Although never is often better than *right* now.If the implementation is hard to explain, it's a bad idea.If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea.Namespaces are one honking great idea -- let's do more of those! EndThis is end!
